Name: Emperor's Shadow
Description:
Royal Guard specialist. Can use Pyrokinetic Immolation and EMP Blast. Can call down Tactical Missiles built at the Royal Academy.

Can attack ground and air units.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to holster their weapons and avoid engaging enemies, unless given a direct command. Units holding fire will flee if attacked.
Root.Name: Hold Fire

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target point, fighting nearby enemies along the way. Targeting a unit with the Attack command orders that it be attacked until it is destroyed.
Root.Name: Attack

Root.Tooltip: Immolates a target Biological enemy for 20 seconds, dealing 30 damage per second to themselves and nearby Biological enemies.
Root.Name: Pyrokinetic Immolation

Root.Tooltip: Immolates a target Biological enemy for 20 seconds, dealing 20 damage per second to themselves and nearby Biological enemies.
Root.Name: Pyrokinetic Immolation

Root.Tooltip:
Calls down a Tactical Missile Strike at a target location. Tactical Missiles take 4 seconds to land, but they deal up to 150 (+100 vs. structures) damage to enemies in a small radius.

Purchase charges at the Royal Academy.
Root.Name: Tactical Missile Strike

Root.Tooltip: Killing enemy units grants experience to nearby **Royal Guards**. If there are no nearby Royal Guards when an enemy is killed, the experience is instead split between all Royal Guards in the mission. Experience allows this unit to gain **Rank**, which improves its damage, armor, health, energy, and energy regeneration.
Root.Name: Royal Guard of the Dominion

Root.Tooltip: Deals 100 damage to shields and depletes the energy of enemy units in the target area. Stuns Mechanical units for 2 seconds. Cloaked units are revealed for 10 seconds after being hit.
Root.Name: EMP Blast

Root.Tooltip: Deals 100 damage to shields and depletes the energy of enemy units in the target area. Stuns Mechanical units for 1 second. Cloaked units are revealed for 10 seconds after being hit.
Root.Name: EMP Blast

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to fire at will. They will engage enemy units within range and chase them as normal.
Root.Name: Weapons Free

Root.Tooltip: This upgrade unlocks at Commander Level 14.
Root.Name: Sovereign Tactical Missiles

Root.Tooltip: Tactical Missile Strikes no longer need to be channeled.
Root.Name: Sovereign Tactical Missiles

Root.Tooltip: Prevents the Emperor's Shadow from taking any damage for 10 seconds after being attacked. Cannot occur more than once every 30 seconds.
Root.Name: Labyrinth Cloak

Root.Tooltip: This ability unlocks at Commander Level 5.
Root.Name: Might of the Empire

Root.Tooltip:
Royal Guards increase Imperial Support based on their supply cost and Rank. Each point of Imperial Support generates 1 Imperial Mandate every 240 seconds.

This unit is increasing Imperial Support by 0.
Root.Name: Might of the Empire
